forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 18C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High around 65F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 47F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 17C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 62F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low near 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Thunder possible. High 16C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Thunder possible. High 61F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early with showers developing late. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early with showers developing late. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 18C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 64F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 16C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 62F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 17C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 63F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.
